content.en: Astro-ML: Machine learning algorithms are being used to study various aspects of galaxy formation and evolution. These algorithms are proving to be promising and efficient tools for understanding small-scale structure formation, accurately inferring galaxy star formation histories, estimating cosmological parameters, predicting gas shape profiles, and emulating galaxy formation models. The Cosmology and Astrophysics with Machine-learning Simulations (CAMELS) project is a suite of cosmological simulations designed to train machine-learning algorithms. The project has also released a large amount of data for public use. Overall, machine learning is playing a crucial role in advancing our understanding of the universe.
content.da: Astro-ML: Maskinlæringsalgoritmer bruges til at studere forskellige aspekter af galakseformation og udvikling. Disse algoritmer viser sig at være lovende og effektive værktøjer til at forstå dannelsen af småskala strukturer, præcist udlede galaksernes stjernedannelseshistorier, estimere kosmologiske parametre, forudsige gasformsprofiler og emulere modeller for galakseformation. Projektet Kosmologi og Astrofysik med Maskinlæringssimulationer (CAMELS) er en samling af kosmologiske simulationer designet til at træne maskinlæringsalgoritmer. Projektet har også frigivet en stor mængde data til offentlig brug. Alt i alt spiller maskinlæring en afgørende rolle i at fremme vores forståelse af universet.
